video_prompt: Red flower petals subtly unfurl and ripple. Glowing red embers pulse and shift across the petals and leaves, increasing intensity. The background subtly darkens and lightens, enhancing the flower's luminescence.
image_prompt: Striking vertical close-up of a dark red peony/dahlia with glowing red accents against a deep black background. Petals transition from golden-beige to deep burgundy with black tips. Features numerous tiny, bright red "ember" like glowing dots scattered across petals and dark leaves. Emphasizes subtle light emitted from the flower.
refined_video_prompt: Petals gently unfurl and subtly ripple. Red embers pulse and shift across surfaces, their intensity growing. The background subtly darkens and lightens, causing the flower's luminescence to strengthen.
